ShiolinkJS » Index » ShiolinkJS

Class: ShiolinkJS

Defined in: src\lib\shiolink.coffee

Overview

SHIOLINK protocol interface. This parses SHIOLINK protocol and passes data to basic "SHIORI engine" and response to out.

Property Summary

(Engine) engine
engine
(ShioriJK.Shiori.Request.Parser) request_parser
parser

Instance Method Summary

  • # (Promise) add_chunk(chunk) append SHIOLINK protocol chunk
  • # (Promise) add_lines(lines) append SHIOLINK protocol chunk lines
  • # (Promise) add_line(line) append SHIOLINK protocol chunk line

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(engine)

Note: Engine must implements load(), request(), unload()

Parameters:

  • engine ( Engine ) — engine

Instance Method Details

# (Promise) add_chunk(chunk)

append SHIOLINK protocol chunk

Parameters:

  • chunk ( String ) — SHIOLINK protocol chunk

Returns:

  • ( Promise ) — add_lines()'s result

# (Promise) add_lines(lines)

append SHIOLINK protocol chunk lines

Parameters:

  • lines ( Array<String> ) — SHIOLINK protocol chunk lines separated by \r\n

Returns:

  • ( Promise ) — Promise of string result that is combination of add_line()'s result. It may be empty string, not undefined / null.

# (Promise) add_line(line)

append SHIOLINK protocol chunk line

Parameters:

  • line ( String ) — SHIOLINK protocol chunk line

Returns:

  • ( Promise ) — If request transaction is completed, Promise resolved value is response transaction string, and if not, none (undefined value). If Engine throws error, Promise resolved value will be 500 Internal Server Error string.
